channel.title: Communications on Priceless Trainwreck
channel.description: Recent content in Communications on Priceless Trainwreck

item.title: January 2024
item.description: January 2024 This week I’ve accumulated over 5000 in pledges. I kinda wish this was a joke but I have a genuine addiction. I have no idea what I’m doing. Please help. My girlfriend is pissed about how much I spent on ships this week she said she may actually leave and went back to her parents. I had to tell her I ruined my credit and we can’t get a new apartment this year till I fix it
